title: 1000th win
body: Riot pls I'm past 1000th win but come play a a game pls

replies.body: Add me in game, i'll play!
I added you, my summoner name is HorneyBagel

~~meh don't worry... I got my 1000th win ages ago, rioter added me but never found time for us to play...~~


Nevermind, Just got added by sephyre and we played a game :D
